```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(httr)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
x <- read.csv(url("https://data.calgary.ca/api/views/35ra-9556/rows.csv?accessType=DOWNLOAD")) 
```

```{r}
df <- x %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(year = format(as.Date(START_DT, "%Y/%m/%d %I:%M:%S %p"), "%Y")) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(month = format(as.Date(START_DT, "%Y/%m/%d %I:%M:%S %p"), "%m")) %>% 

  dplyr::select(year, month, Count) %>% 
  group_by(year, month) %>% 
  summarise(count = n())

df
x
```
